name: Simon the Sorcerer
description: GOG version. Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).

files.game: N/A:Select the setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  game_id: simon1
  path: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Simon the Sorcerer/
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: game
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
scummvm:
  aspect: true
